description: This file defines a Flutter widget screen for an audiobook store front. It displays a grid of audiobooks with options to preview and purchase them, integrating with application state and custom theming.

classes.name: StoreScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a grid of audiobooks available in the store.

classes.name: _StoreCard
classes.description: A stateless widget representing individual audiobook cards within the store grid, with display and purchase functionality.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for StoreScreen, including the header and grid layout.

methods.name: _StoreCard.build
methods.description: Builds the UI for each audiobook card, including cover image, author, title, price, and purchase button.
